theHeroOfJustice:Kanchou.NAME: Kanchou
theHeroOfJustice:Kanchou.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Bakuya to your hand.
theHeroOfJustice:Kanchou.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Bakuya+ to your hand.

theHeroOfJustice:DesperateSwipe.NAME: Desperate Swipe
theHeroOfJustice:DesperateSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have !M! or fewer NL theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits, gain !M!.

theHeroOfJustice:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theHeroOfJustice:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theHeroOfJustice:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theHeroOfJustice:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theHeroOfJustice:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theHeroOfJustice:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theHeroOfJustice:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theHeroOfJustice:DefaultAttackWithVariab.NAME: Special Strike
theHeroOfJustice:DefaultAttackWithVariab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theHeroOfJustice:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theHeroOfJustice:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theHeroOfJustice:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theHeroOfJustice:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
